name: Trench Defender (Pixemble)
description:
This is a game i made for Pix & Bits Game Jam 19.

      In this game, you must defend the trench from enemies by shooting them. Every enemy you kill, you will get some score. But if one enemy soldier passes your trench you lose. The amount of enemies in this game is endless.  So shoot them and kill them as many as you can :) 

Game controls:

  •  W: Move up
  •   S: Move down
  •  Space:  Shoot

Good luck & have fun!
